sentences.en: Air travel will continue to grow at about 6% per year.
sentences.cn: 乘飞机旅行的人数将以每年大约6%的速度持续增加。

sentences.en: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

sentences.en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
sentences.cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

sentences.en: He leant against the wall, fighting for strength to continue.
sentences.cn: 他靠在墙上,努力想鼓起劲继续下去.

sentences.en: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.cn: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.en: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.cn: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
sentences.cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

sentences.en: If climate changes continue, we will suffer the consequences.
sentences.cn: 如果气候变化继续下去，我们将自食其果。

sentences.en: In the meantime the war of nerves seems likely to continue.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，心理战似乎还可能继续。

sentences.en: It would be wrong to continue out of perversity.
sentences.cn: 为了故意作对而继续这样做是不对的。

sentences.en: It's important that these upland farms continue to survive.
sentences.cn: 这些高原农场能继续存在下去非常重要。

sentences.en: Lewis was not in the right frame of mind to continue.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯当时的心情不适合继续下去。

sentences.en: Sovereign power will continue to lie with the Supreme People's Assembly.
sentences.cn: 最高统治权仍然掌握在最高人民会议手中。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: The pound is expected to continue to increase against most other currencies.
sentences.cn: 英镑对大多数其他货币的汇率有望继续升高。

sentences.en: The rebels continue their push towards the beleaguered capital.
sentences.cn: 叛军继续向四面被围的首都推进。

sentences.en: The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.cn: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

sentences.en: The talks are set to continue through the week.
sentences.cn: 谈判可能会持续一周。

sentences.en: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.cn: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.en: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.cn: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

words.tran_cn: 连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的
持续；停留；续篇；诉讼延期
继续；续集；延长；附加部分；扩建物
连续性；一连串；分镜头剧本
继续；逗留；维持原状（continue的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 持续，继续，再开始，移动，延伸，留任，维持现状，接着说
trans.tran_en: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something
